episodes.overview: A couple that fell in love with Italy after a short trip to Rome follows his Air Force career to Pozzuoli. They're looking for a home close to his job with breathtaking views and plenty of outdoor space for their dog to enjoy.

episodes.name: Room for Everyone in Valencia
episodes.overview: A Miami couple fell in love with Spain because of its shared Spanish heritage with their hometown. Now, they want to relocate to Valencia and hope to find a home that suits the entire family's needs, including three kids and three dogs.

episodes.name: Old-world Charm in Nice

episodes.name: Loving Life in Valencia

episodes.name: Sweet Life in Sicily
episodes.overview: A former US Navy oceanography officer, his wife and two young sons are moving back to her home of Sicily, Italy, after years of living in the States. She wants to be as close to the sea as possible, but he prefers a home near the center of town.

episodes.name: Greece is the Word
episodes.overview: A couple is ready to escape working long hours in the rainy United Kingdom with a move to Kefalonia, Greece. They hope to find a traditional Greek home with gorgeous sea views, a home office for him and space for their son to play.

episodes.name: At Home on the Italian Riviera
episodes.overview: A woman who always dreamed of living abroad moves to Italy after discovering she can apply for dual citizenship. She wants an Italian-style property so she can rediscover her Italian roots, connect with her heritage and learn about her family.

episodes.name: Finding an Oasis in Crete
episodes.overview: After building their company in Amsterdam, a couple wants to start a new life in Crete, Greece. They hope to find a home with the ideal environment for working that also allows them to enjoy the local food and rich culture.
